predicate.note: Frames file for 'growl' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to speak in an angry or surly manner

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` Babies , kiddies , '' growls [*T*-1] their manager -- a fellow named [*-2] Earl Weaver , who , in a different time , [*T*-3] handled four World Series teams and now [*T*-3] handles the Gold Coast Suns .
example.arg: their manager -- a fellow named [*-2] Earl Weaver , who , in a different time , [*T*-3] handled four World Series teams and now [*T*-3] handles the Gold Coast Suns
